TopicTitle: [0.14+] Elderberry Ni V2 Telemetry System version 0.2.1 [bugfix update!]

Articles.Content:
With the latest versin of the Corax Telemetry Antenna, Whistler Services has decided that it is time to forget the old Telemetry System and build a new one.

So we did did just that, threw out the old one to make space for the new one! It is much more steamlined, and I do not only mean the antenna, but also the software on the receiving end.

(Reasons are that the software grew a tad to complex and complicated, so I decided to start again and make it more modular, scalable and so on.)

Download for 0.2.1 can be found [here](https://code.google.com/p/elderberry-ni/downloads/detail?name=ElderberryNi2.0.2.1.zip).

Source can is found [here](https://code.google.com/p/elderberry-ni/source/browse). [Check it out](https://code.google.com/p/elderberry-ni/source/checkout)!
